ack.p: Chikungunya Lazio Outbreak Group (in alphabetical order): Rosa Francesca Alicata, Alessandro Agresta, Silvia Aquilani, Giuseppina Bartolomei, Licia Bordi, Carlo Cerocchi, Francesca Colavita, Angela Corpolongo, Maurizio D’Amato, Claudio De Liberato, Stefano De Luca, Virginia Di Bari, Giuseppe Di Luzio, Enrico Di Rosa, Giorgio Esterini, Federica Ferraro, Roberto Giammattei, Marco Iannetta, Vincenzo Labriola, Eleonora Lalle, Mariarosaria Loffredo, Adele Magliano, Donatella Mandolini, Fabrizio Magrelli, Andrea Mariano, Pier Angela Napoli, Alessio Pendenza, Alberto Perra, Alberto Piccoli, Raffaella Pisapia, Patricia Porcelli, Pasquale Rombolà, Amilcare Ruta, Monica Sanè Schepisi, Sara Simeoni, Donatella Vincenti.

The authors would like also to acknowledge the contributions of all staff of Local Public Health Units who managed the report of single cases and performed preliminary epidemiologic investigation of cases.
